name: echoshift
description:
echoshift™ redefines puzzle games with a new game play mechanic that challenges you to manipulate time and be in multiple places at once! Solve puzzles by layering your decisions to push switches, bridge gaps, and much more. Like the PSN hit, echochrome™, echoshift™ has a unique art style and great soundtrack, but changes how you'll think about puzzle games.
The innovative game play lets you create echoes of your actions that you replay and cooperate with to perform tricks, dodge obstacles and solve the puzzles in your way. You'll have to think quickly and use your past decisions in this artistically stylized world, available exclusively on the PSP® system.
Download echoshift™ today!
Features:
• Cooperate with your past decisions using innovative game play
• Master 56 challenging levels and 3 different playing styles
• Solve over 30 types of puzzles and obstacles
• Enjoy artistic and colorful graphics alongside an elegantly composed soundtrack
